title: Lithium secondary battery

events.title: Application filed by Sanyo Electric Co Ltd

classifications.description: Manufacturing or production processes characterised by the final manufactured product

abstract:
PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a lithium secondary battery using particles of silicon and/or silicon alloy as a negative electrode active material, having improved charge-discharge cycle property.

SOLUTION: The lithium secondary battery comprises: a positive electrode where an positive electrode active material layer containing a positive electrode active material including lithium transition metal composite oxide having a layered structure and positive electrode binder are arranged on a positive electrode collector; a negative electrode where a negative electrode active material layer containing the negative electrode active material including particles of silicon and/or silicon alloy and negative electrode binder are arranged on a negative electrode collector; a separator arranged between the positive electrode and the negative electrode; and a nonaqueous electrolyte, wherein an electrode formed with the positive electrode and the negative electrode opposed to each other via the separator and wound thereon is stored in a battery case holder. The lithium transition metal composite oxide has Al2O3particles fixed onto the surface so that its BET specific surface area after fixed is 1.5-8 times that before fixed.

COPYRIGHT: (C)2009,JPO&INPIT
claims:
層状構造を有するリチウム遷移金属複合酸化物を含む正極活物質及び正極バインダーを含む正極活物質層を正極集電体上に配置した正極と、ケイ素及び／またはケイ素合金の粒子を含む負極活物質及び負極バインダーを含む負極活物質層を負極集電体上に配置した負極と、前記正極及び前記負極の間に配置されるセパレータと、非水電解質とを備え、前記正極と前記負極とを前記セパレータを介して対向させ巻回させてなる電極体を電池容器内に収納させたリチウム二次電池において、
  前記リチウム遷移金属複合酸化物が、固着前に比べ、固着後のＢＥＴ比表面積が１．５倍〜８倍となるように、その表面上にＡｌ２Ｏ３粒子を固着させたリチウム遷移金属複合酸化物であることを特徴とするリチウム二次電池。
A positive electrode in which a positive electrode active material including a lithium transition metal composite oxide having a layered structure and a positive electrode active material layer including a positive electrode binder are disposed on a positive electrode current collector, a negative electrode active material including particles of silicon and / or silicon alloy, and A negative electrode in which a negative electrode active material layer containing a negative electrode binder is disposed on a negative electrode current collector, a separator disposed between the positive electrode and the negative electrode, and a non-aqueous electrolyte, wherein the positive electrode and the negative electrode are separated from the separator. In a lithium secondary battery in which an electrode body that is wound while facing it is housed in a battery container,  Lithium transition metal composite oxide in which Al 2 O 3 particles are fixed on the surface of the lithium transition metal composite oxide so that the BET specific surface area after fixation is 1.5 to 8 times that before fixation. A lithium secondary battery characterized by being an oxide.

前記正極活物質層が、１５％〜２８％の空隙率を有することを特徴とする請求項１に記載のリチウム二次電池。

  The lithium secondary battery according to claim 1, wherein the positive electrode active material layer has a porosity of 15% to 28%.

固着前に比べ、固着後のＢＥＴ比表面積が２．５倍〜７．５倍となるようにＡｌ２Ｏ３粒子が固着されていることを特徴とする請求項１または２に記載のリチウム二次電池。
 3. The lithium secondary battery according to claim 1, wherein the Al 2 O 3 particles are fixed so that a BET specific surface area after fixing is 2.5 to 7.5 times that before fixing. Next battery.

前記ＢＥＴ比表面積となるようにＡｌ２Ｏ３粒子とともにＬｉ３ＰＯ４粒子が固着されていることを特徴とする請求項１または２に記載のリチウム二次電池。
The lithium secondary battery according to claim 1, wherein Li 3 PO 4 particles are fixed together with Al 2 O 3 particles so as to have the BET specific surface area.

前記電極体が渦巻状であり、前記電池容器が円筒型であることを特徴とする請求項１または２に記載のリチウム二次電池。

  The lithium secondary battery according to claim 1, wherein the electrode body has a spiral shape, and the battery container has a cylindrical shape.

前記非水電解質が、その溶媒としてジメチルカーボネートを含むことを特徴とする請求項１〜５のいずれか１項に記載のリチウム二次電池。

  The lithium secondary battery according to claim 1, wherein the non-aqueous electrolyte contains dimethyl carbonate as a solvent thereof.
